org.xlattice.overlay.namekeyed

Class DiskByName

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xlattice.overlay.namekeyed.DiskByName
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NameKeyed, NameKeyedReader, NameKeyedWriter

    public class DiskByName
extends java.lang.Object
implements NameKeyed
    Provides a blocking ByteBuffer get/put interface to a set of named files. All file names are relative to a base directory.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void delete(java.lang.String key, DelCallBack listener) 
      void get(java.lang.String key, GetCallBack listener)
      Given the name of a file (expressed as a path relative to the base directory), return its contents wrapped in a ByteBuffer.

      • get

        public void get(java.lang.String key,
                GetCallBack listener)
        Given the name of a file (expressed as a path relative to the base directory), return its contents wrapped in a ByteBuffer. If there is any problem accessing the file, returns null.
        Specified by:
        get in interface NameKeyedReader
        Parameters:
        key - the pathname of a file

        Specified by:
